Dialogue.Page: Hey.
Hello.
Finally! I was getting a bit lonely down here.
It's been a while since I've seen anyone.
Could you get me out of here? I need sunlight.
Are you also stuck down here?
Don't scream. I won't eat you.
I should have never touched that rock.
Yeah. Remember me? Ernesto the magic talking anglerfish?

DialogueOption.Text: Never seen you in my life.

Dialogue.Page: Good.
I guess I wasn't as popular as I thought.
Have you found a way out of here? I've looked everywhere, but all I could find was that portrait.

DialogueOption.Text: You can use the same rock that brought you in here.

Dialogue.Page: Oh, cool. I'll keep that in mind.
I guess I'd better get comfy then.
Anything you wanna talk about while we're down here?
Did you wanna ask me something?
Tell me a story or something. I'm bored to death down here.
So, has anything interesting happened up there on the surface?
What sort of stuff has been going on up there?
I've been down here a while, what'd I miss on the surface?
I hope I can find a way out of here soon. Let's talk while we wait.
What would you like to ask Ernesto, the magic talking anglerfish?
There must be something you want to ask me. Otherwise you would have left already.
Why are you still here? Do you need something?
It must be my charming personality that's keeping you down here. Otherwise you would be gone by now.
Why are you still here? Am I that alluring?
Are you here to marvel at my bulb? It's pretty cool.
Is my light compelling you to stay here and chat? I hope it is.
Hey, have you seen my light? Doesn't it make you want to be hypnotized? No? It must not be working.

DialogueOption.Text: One of the Ghirds was looking for you.
Why is there a portrait of the Sacred Shrubbery in here?
Why is there a portrait of the Sacred Shrubbery in here?
I need to go, see you later.

Dialogue.Page: Tell them I'll be back soon. I think I might stay down here a bit longer.
It's kind of hard being the best magical anglerfish there is, you know? It's a lot of pressure.
What? What do you mean I'm not the best magical anglerfish??
I'm getting hungry. Leave while you still can.
No idea. The only thing in here is these candles and a portrait of a bush. It's probably a secret altar or something.
I'm no expert on that, though. I don't know anything at all about it, actually.
No idea. The only thing in here is these candles and a portrait of a bush.

DialogueOption.Text: It's the Sacred Shrubbery, not a bush.
Did you just call It a bush?

Dialogue.Page: The Sacred Shrubbery? You pray to a plant?
Your species is weird.
Call what a bush? And why are you emphasizing the "it"?

DialogueOption.Text: It's not a bush! It's the Sacred Shrubbery!

Dialogue.Page: Is that what it's called? Weird name for a bush.
It's probably down here because it's a seceret altar or something. Not like I would know anything about that, though. Can we talk about something else?
Why are you asking me? Ask the ones who put it down here. It's probably just a seceret altar or something.
Not like I would know anything about that, though. Can we talk about something else?
